description:
Fearing that the love story between Suzuki and Mamiko is lacking something exciting, Nozaki asks Chiyo for some ideas when she visits. Chiyo suggests doing something that`ll surprise or shock, so Nozaki tells her that he`ll try that out on her and that he wants her honest opinion. He then starts doing things that are meant to shock and surprise her at school, but...
Source: crunchyroll
